name: CLAWSON7 (CLAWSON7.WAD, CLAWSON7.ZIP)
description: Plot? Who needs a plot? Ummm, you're dropped in the crater of a dead volcano and someone just happened to leave weapons and shit all over the place. Maybe you're in some futuristic combat training facility. Perhaps a religious cult was living in a secluded mountain and built all of this but then suddenly decided to mass suicide. Who cares?
